content:
Hi, I didn't see a stream specific to the crates.io team so I'm posting here. Feel free to direct me elsewhere if there is a more suitable forum. Thx!

I have a published crate rusty_paseto that I'm struggling with rendering the readme the way I want it to. I'm probably doing something silly.

I'm trying to get some checkmarks to render in a table but I can't seem to do that.

I've tried [x] and - [x] - [ ]

Ideally I could do something like on the crate's github readme however symbols don't seem to be supported. Is there a reference for the crates.io markdown support or am I just barking up the wrong tree with this?
@rodzilla crates.io is on the official discord, not zulip
Thanks much @Joshua Nelson ! I'll head over there! :+1:
rodzilla has marked this topic as resolved.
